tool.name: astropy fitsinfo

configfiles.configfile:
from astropy.io import fits from astropy.table import Table
with fits.open("$input_fits", memmap=True):
# select the HDU you want hdu = hdu_list[1]
# read into an astropy Table object table = Table(hdu.data)
# write to a CSV file data.write('$output_csv', delimiter='\t', format='ascii')

tool.help:
Return a summary of the HDUs and their metadata (image dimensions and types, table columns, etc) in a FITS file..
---------
**Example:**
For example, here is the output for on of the sample fits files, https://fits.gsfc.nasa.gov/samples/WFPC2u5780205r_c0fx.fits
